import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { setProducts } from '../redux/reducers/allProdactReducer' function Header() { const selector = useSelector(state => state.product.array) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { const newSelector = selector.filter(element => { return element.category === 'electronics'; }) dispatch(setProducts(newSelector)) return ()=>{ dispatch(removeProdut()) } }, []) return ( <>
  • Home
) } export default Header
